text: Korean Necklace-pod (syn. Echisophora koreensis) is an endangered species in Korea. Former classified by Nakai as Sophora koreensis,Notulae ad plantae Japoniae et Coreae The Botanical Magazine 33:8 latter himself transfer to a new monotypic genus Echinosophora ==Sources== *WikiSage Sophora koreensis ==References== Category:Faboideae
title: Sophora koreensis
